scenario: I'm doing one online shopping session to prepare for a friend's birthday and a small home refresh. Add a $100 Best Buy gift card for the birthday and the best-selling men's T-shirt in large size, short sleeve, and Halloween event style to my cart. Then find and add the cheapest black sofa with at least three seats, a leather finish, and at least four stars to my cart.
combined_task: In a single shopping session, add a $100 Best Buy birthday gift card, the best-selling large short-sleeve Halloween men's T-shirt, and the cheapest qualifying black leather three-seat sofa (≥4 stars) to my cart.
selected_subtasks: Add a $100 Best Buy gift card for a birthday to my cart.
Add the best-selling men's T-shirt in large size, short sleeve, and Halloween event style to my cart.
Add the cheapest black sofa with at least three seats, a leather finish, and at least four stars to my cart.
